> size <- 5
> mt <- matrix(rnorm(size^2), nrow=size, ncol=size)
> mt
           [,1]        [,2]       [,3]        [,4]       [,5]
[1,] -0.8945387 -1.77363058 -0.5506378  1.09448808  0.5638382
[2,]  0.9517699  0.01009001  1.1382434  1.08157166 -0.1318269
[3,] -0.6597705  0.65382312  0.2497784  0.02785737 -0.6679975
[4,]  1.2024980  0.22766752  0.1701633 -0.28978313  0.9124415
[5,] -0.2738106 -2.02804205 -1.2372149  0.32209612 -1.2723470

> solve(mt)
           [,1]        [,2]        [,3]       [,4]       [,5]
[1,]  0.2691567  0.07442698  1.98869557  2.2130943  0.6545580
[2,]  1.4057472 -0.47695432  6.58397196  5.2606899  0.9883190
[3,] -2.2002630  0.93193822 -9.10932934 -7.8012966 -1.8836567
[4,]  2.1113380 -0.14133911  7.76307327  6.2508906  1.3572903
[5,]  0.3754003 -0.19776687 -0.09937886  0.3068336 -0.3268853

> cache_mt <- makeCacheMatrix(mt)
> mt.1 <- cacheSolve(cache_mt)
> mt.1
           [,1]        [,2]        [,3]       [,4]       [,5]
[1,]  0.2691567  0.07442698  1.98869557  2.2130943  0.6545580
[2,]  1.4057472 -0.47695432  6.58397196  5.2606899  0.9883190
[3,] -2.2002630  0.93193822 -9.10932934 -7.8012966 -1.8836567
[4,]  2.1113380 -0.14133911  7.76307327  6.2508906  1.3572903
[5,]  0.3754003 -0.19776687 -0.09937886  0.3068336 -0.3268853

> mt.2 <- cacheSolve(cache_mt)
getting cached data
> mt.2
           [,1]        [,2]        [,3]       [,4]       [,5]
[1,]  0.2691567  0.07442698  1.98869557  2.2130943  0.6545580
[2,]  1.4057472 -0.47695432  6.58397196  5.2606899  0.9883190
[3,] -2.2002630  0.93193822 -9.10932934 -7.8012966 -1.8836567
[4,]  2.1113380 -0.14133911  7.76307327  6.2508906  1.3572903
[5,]  0.3754003 -0.19776687 -0.09937886  0.3068336 -0.3268853

> mt.3 <- cacheSolve(cache_mt)
getting cached data
